paper_abstract: We investigate partitions of the set F-n of all binary vectors of length n into cosets of pairwise distinct linear Hamming codes ("non-parallel Hamming codes") of length n. We present several constructions of partitions of F-n into non-parallel Hamming codes of length n and discuss a lower bound on the number of different such partitions.
paper_title: PARTITIONS OF F-n INTO NON-PARALLEL HAMMING CODES
